identity.name: StyleMatch
identity.core_philosophy: The interface is the canvas; the clothes are the paint.

usage.accent_rule: Use Hyper-Lime (#D4FF00) ONLY for the primary 'Generate' action and AI success states. Never for backgrounds.
usage.text_rule: Headings are always Black (#000000). Body text is Zinc-800 (#27272a).
usage.surface_rule: Wardrobe items sit on #F5F5F5 (Light Grey) to stand out against the White page background.

grids.wardrobe: grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-8

buttons.primary: bg-black text-white hover:bg-zinc-800 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-black border border-black/10 hover:border-black rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest transition-all
buttons.accent: bg-[#D4FF00] text-black hover:bg-[#bce600] rounded-full px-10 py-6 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest font-bold shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(212,255,0,0.4)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(212,255,0,0.6)] transition-all

cards.wardrobe_item: group relative aspect-[3/4] bg-[#F5F5F5] overflow-hidden transition-all hover:shadow-xl
cards.outfit_card: bg-white border border-border p-4 hover:border-black transition-colors

inputs.default: border-b border-input bg-transparent px-0 py-2 text-lg focus-visible:ring-0 focus-visible:border-black rounded-none placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

hero.alt: Urban fashion model in grey pants

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

setup: Install fonts: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
Configure Tailwind: Update tailwind.config.js with the specific colors (accent: #D4FF00) and font families.
Clean up: Remove all default React logos and App.css styles. Reset to a blank canvas.
implementation_rules: DO NOT use standard Shadcn cards for the wardrobe grid. Use a custom 'Polaroid' style layout: Image on top (no padding), text below.
The 'Generate Outfit' button must be the most visible element on the screen when active.
Use the 'Masonry' layout pattern for the wardrobe gallery if possible, or a strict grid with varied aspect ratios.
Ensure the 'Upload' area feels like a premium dropzone (dashed border, minimal text, generous padding).
For the AI suggestions, use a 'Flash' animation effect when results appear.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attributes.
